# docker_network (Data Source)

Use this data source to get information about a Docker network.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Get information about an existing network
data "docker_network" "bridge" {
  name = "bridge"
}

output "bridge_network_id" {
  value = data.docker_network.bridge.id
}

output "bridge_network_driver" {
  value = data.docker_network.bridge.driver
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the Docker network.

### Read-Only

- `driver` (String) The driver of the Docker network.
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `internal` (Boolean) Whether the network is internal.
- `labels` (Map of String) User-defined key/value metadata.
- `options` (Map of String) Driver-specific options.
- `scope` (String) The scope of the network.
